text: The Soviet Championship League was the top level ice hockey league in the Soviet Union from 1946-1992. ==Champions== * 1992 - Dynamo Moscow * 1991 - Dynamo Moscow * 1990 - Dynamo Moscow * 1989 - CSKA Moscow * 1988 - CSKA Moscow * 1987 - CSKA Moscow * 1986 - CSKA Moscow * 1985 - CSKA Moscow * 1984 - CSKA Moscow * 1983 - CSKA Moscow * 1982 - CSKA Moscow * 1981 - CSKA Moscow * 1980 - CSKA Moscow * 1979 - CSKA Moscow * 1978 - CSKA Moscow * 1977 - CSKA Moscow * 1976 - HC Spartak Moscow * 1975 - CSKA Moscow * 1974 - Krylia Sovetov Moscow * 1973 - CSKA Moscow * 1972 - CSKA Moscow * 1971 - CSKA Moscow * 1970 - CSKA Moscow * 1969 - HC Spartak Moscow * 1968 - CSKA Moscow * 1967 - HC Spartak Moscow * 1966 - CSKA Moscow * 1965 - CSKA Moscow * 1964 - CSKA Moscow * 1963 - CSKA Moscow * 1962 - HC Spartak Moscow * 1961 - CSKA Moscow * 1960 - CSKA Moscow * 1959 - CSKA Moscow * 1958 - CSKA Moscow * 1957 - Krylya Sovetov Moscow * 1956 - CSKA Moscow * 1955 - CSKA Moscow * 1954 - Dynamo Moscow * 1953 - VVS Moscow * 1952 - VVS Moscow * 1951 - VVS Moscow * 1950 - CSKA Moscow * 1949 - CSKA Moscow * 1948 - CSKA Moscow * 1947 - Dynamo Moscow ==Related pages== Category:Ice hockey leagues
title: Soviet Championship League
